author: That Gaming Author

text:
Are all the SMT series connected in some way? It appears there is the main series, which I heard about through this channel, then Persona and now Digital Devil. Any connecting stories or locations? Or just overall themes. 

I'm starting Persona 4 and if I'm missing out on cool stuff that ties into that game's story, I want to check it out (assuming I can find it.
author: Patrick Kruse

text:
Each game is in their own individual world, although in Shin Megami Tensei series, the entire series resolves around the war between Lucifer, God, & you, a human. In a sense, it's a war between Chaos/Demon (Lucifer), Law/Heavenly (God), or Neutral/Human (Humanity). Only SMT & SMT II has a connection in-between, while the rest is on their own.

As for Persona series, only Persona 3 and Persona 4 has a connection, with the latter being the 'after-years' of the primer (in other words, P3 characters has grown up while P4 characters is still on what they are now).
